MailTemp.Subject: Gefingerprints | Email Verification Link
MailTemp.Body:
Hi $Name$,
Congratulations, your registration request has been submitted successfully.
You need to verify your registered email ID.
Please click below link to confirm your email ID.
$Link$
After successful verification, you can enter your personal information for further process.
If you have any questions or need support, email us at support@gefingerprints.com
Thank You,
GE Fingerprints Team
